# Note that most of these are included by including higher level packages.
# The main packages have been identified with comments
#
# This file has been generated by creating a fresh virtual environment
# > conda create -n my_env python=3.7
# > conda activate my_env
# grep-ing for all the includes (There is probably a better way to do this)
# pip installing all the dependencies
# > pip install <my_included_package>
# List everything that is installed
# > pip freeze > requirements.txt
# Optional: Update packages to greater or equal to.
#  (This may not always be safe)
# > conda deactivate
#
# For new environments:
# > pip install --user --requirement requirements.txt
#
